channel.description: Recent content in Bix on My New Hugo Site

item.title: News In Small Bytes
item.description: [whitebox] [big]Today in Tedium: Publishing words on a computer is not a difficult task these days. We have so many options to write words and distribute them through a computerized interface that we take the whole process for granted. (You probably published something in the time it took you to read the previous two sentences.) But there was a time when publishing through a computer was painful, cumbersome, and expensive.
